channel.title: Command help plz

item.title: Command help plz
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

just wondering if anyone knew…how would i make a command to set a different color for my character chat color. i would like it to be gold/yellow or red. also, have the owner crown by it. i have a 508 btw… would it be something like this?

if (cmd[0].equals(“chat”)) {
(p.frames.sendMessage" Misc.optimizeText(p.username) + “: <col=fff000><shad=0202>” + Misc.optimizeText(chatText));
}
}

…lol… i don’t rly know. i have tried this and compiled and i didn’t get an error, but it didn’t work. so i am clearly doing something wrong…
help plz?!

Read full topic
